english.segment1: You stood before creation. Eternity in your hand. You spoke the earth into motion. My soul now to stand
english.segment2: You stood before my failure. And carried the cross for my shame. My sin weighed upon your shoulders. My soul now to stand
english.segment3: So what could I say?. And what could I do?. But offer this heart, Oh God. Completely to you
english.segment4: So I'll walk upon salvation. Your spirit alive in me. This life to declare your promise. My soul now to stand
english.segment5: So what could I say?. And what could I do?. But offer this heart, Oh God. Completely to you
english.segment6: I'll stand. With arms high and heart abandoned. In awe of the one who gave it all. I'll stand. My soul Lord to you surrendered. All I am is yours
